description: List material suppliers with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Admins can list all material suppliers. Non-admins can list material suppliers tied to brokers they are members of, material suppliers they are members of, and (when lacking mutation access) brokers related to active customer or trucker memberships.
validation_notes: Filters use AND logic. name is a partial match filter. broker accepts comma-separated broker IDs. is-broker-active expects a true/false value.

flags.name: --broker
flags.description: Filter by broker ID (comma-separated for multiple)
